title: Unified inbox email forwarding sets wrong sender, not the one who received the message
content:
Since I am having 10+ e-mail accounts in a TB 115.16.0esr (latest stable on Debian 12), I am using Unified Inbox where i can read all received mail under one "folder". Though when I do it and right click received mail, select Forward as > attachment (or just Forward), then the Thunderbird wrongly sets different account of mine as a sender instead of the one which received the message.

I need to always bother checking this and switching (sometimes i forget and send from a wrong accoung, which is also a privacy issue), which is annoying and I am unsure if I have misconfigured the TB or how to fix this? Thank you
creator: postcd

title: errore formattazione email
content: Buongiorno ad alcuni mie colleghi capita di non riuscire a visualizzare il contenuto delle mail che magari hanno letto 1 o 2 settimane fa(anche email più vecchie in alcuni casi), mentre questo non accade da webmail, al posto dell'errore visualizzo soltanto un striscia alfanumerica qualcuno ha idea di cosa potrebbe essere? usiamo imap come configurazione
creator: tosoni.alessio

title: Deletion of email messages so slow
content:
I am new to TB, I am based in the UK,.

My OS for now is Win 10 Pro, for years I have been receiving/sending my emails via " Windows Live Mail " but this will no longer be supported in upcoming Windows Upgrades.

I downloaded and set up TB, version 128.3.2esr 64bit and pretty much got it behaving as Live Mail did, my email account is POP3 protocol.

Some issues, the first, bulk deletion of unwanted emails.

I selected 80 emails for deletion/trashing, clicked the Trash icon, it took 42 minutes to complete, this cannot be right, I tried the compacting option which had no effect on speeding things up.

Trashing one email, its ok, three or over and the process is very slow.

How do I resolve this please?
creator: tafos7

title: [Help] How to send base64 html enco
content:
Hello. I am using Thunderbird 128.3.2esr to send emails in HTML format. However, what I want to do is to encode the email content in base64 when sending an email in HTML format. I looked for the settings but I can't figure it out, so I'm asking for help. Currently, the email header is set to Content-Transfer-Encoding:7bit. I want to encode the email content by changing 7bit to base64. How should I do this?

========================

X-MS-Exchange-CrossTenant-RMS-PersistedConsumerOrg: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 X-MS-Exchange-Transport-CrossTenantHeadersStamped: LV8P220MB1844

dI2sykwRGdwHuRnBS0Jz9ekC

Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">

asd

dI2sykwRGdwHuRnBS0Jz9ekC
creator: sunghwank266

title: Not always able to receive emails through Thunderbird Client
content:
Hello, My problem is that I am not always able to retrieve/receive my emails through the Thunderbird client. I get a message that says failed to connect to server. All of a suddent this started happening. If any emails come through, they are usually dated two or three weeks previously. The latest batch of emails that are in my in-box today (21 Oct) are dated 5 Oct). I would appreciate any help that you could give. Thank you very much.

Dianne

title: 在thunderbird 128.3.1esr（64 位）版本中日历出现了不能拖拽的情况
content:
在日历页面中，在多周和月的视图中，不能拖拽事件到别的天数中，经过调试发现有 JavaScript error: chrome://calendar/content/calendar-dnd-listener.js, line 916: TypeError: cal.dragService.invokeDragSession is not a function 有这个错误 是什么情况 有人遇到过吗

In the calendar page, in the multi-week and month view, you can't drag and drop events to other days. After debugging, it is found that there are JavaScript error: chrome://calendar/content/calendar-dnd-listener.js, line 916: TypeError: cal.dragService.invokeDragSession is not a function What is this error? Has anyone ever encountered it?
